actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide that the cost of board, lodging, or other facilities provided an employee will be included in computing his wage for purposes of determining compliance with that act only if the employee specifically request the board, lodging, or other facilities to be furnished.

summary.text: Provides under the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 that the cost of board, lodging, or other facilities provided an employee will be included in computing his wage for purposes of determining compliance with the Fair Labor Standards Act only if the employee specifically requests the board, lodging, or other facilities to be furnished.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide that the cost of board, lodging, or other facilities provided an employee will be included in computing his wage for purposes of determining compliance with that act only if the employee specifically request the board, lodging, or other facilities to be furnished.
